what_ive_built: I joined Airbnb in 2009 and acted as the head of marketing, communications and branding strategies. I led business development opportunities and media partnerships to enhance brand strength, market positioning, and distribution. Led partnership and product integration efforts to get Airbnb listings into Hipmunk hotel search product through the development of our first API. Managed global PR operations, marketing communications, and brand strategies and implementations. Managed all related agencies and programs. Led the go to market plan and strategy for our award winning iPhone app, Airbnb Collections (Wish Lists), and the Airbnb photography operation. Recruited, hired and managed our early team of marketers and PR managers. Relocated to London in 2012 to head up communications in EMEA and LATAM. Established the Airbnb brand through PR by securing hundreds of feature articles and thousands of media mentions of Airbnb in over 10 countries. Managed a small team and 7 agencies at the time
bio: Airbnb from 2009, led PR, product marketing. Relocated to London in 2012 to lead comms at Airbnb in EMEA.
name: Christopher Lukezic
